extendedInfo.description: With this application you can see all the updates of the matches for the Qualifiers World Cup Brazil 2014. In addition to viewing the information from all continents can see it globally, by continent and by country.Also available data from previous World Cup.This application is free because we want you to enjoy the football matches home and live with us the excitement of a big event like this.Thank you download our app and we hope you like, if you want you can support us by writing your questions, thanks or wishing to have improvements in future updates.25/03/2013Added menu Gol to Gol which will see the partial results of all matches of the day12/11/2012To the person who said in the comments: "No worky, Displays white screen with ads. Steer clear!"The application is working properly, it may be a temporary problem from your computer or internet, we also have the application "Rumbo a Brasil 2014" in Spanish is the same and there are thousands of people that have it installed.This month (November) we will make a change to improve the speed server for most of the countries that are our application but remember that each country or internet connection is different so it does not always work at the same speed for everyone. Hopefully you can get back to you to try and work better.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this cause it gives me standings for all regions. Most apps concentrate on European or South American.  This app gives you this and all the others.  Even my own concacaf. Finally I can follow all world cup qualifiers on one app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Aswesome!  World cup info at your fingertips and its easy to navigate.
reviews.author: Sal Cerna

reviews.title: No worky
reviews.comment: Displays white screen with ads. Steer clear!
reviews.author: A Google User
